name: The Operation - Beautiful Days (signed)
description:
This is the awesome new release from The Operation. Capturing their classic power trio sound; 'Beautiful Days' is one of the best releases from a rising UK band this year. The album was produced in the bands home time by top UK producer Ben Findlay (Van Morrison, Peter Gabriel, Jeff Beck etc..).

Order now for a refreshing return to classic rock and roll !

Track Listing :
1 Get Up
2 Beautiful Days
3 Take Me Away
4 In The Dust
5 11:58 Monday
6 Miss McGee
7 Days Of The Week
8 Iota
9 Sing For The People
10 Shine On
11 The Hardest Part
12 Without You

name: The Operation - Human Zoo (signed)
description: This is the monster second offering from The Operation featuring first single 'Come Clean' and forth coming single 'I Can See'.
